segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely absorbed in her task of drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is clean, and she seems so focused on making everything shine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't help but notice the water overflowing from the sink, forming a little puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does she not feel the cold water soaking her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are off to the side, oblivious to the chaos happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing the stool, reaching for cookies, and it's so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't imagine what would happen if he falls off and lands in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates the cookie, her hand raised, innocent in her expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outside looks peaceful, almost mocking the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just look up for a moment, just one moment to see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
